name: Sebastian Liu
summary: Senior Front End Engineer who thrives in building startups from the ground up, no matter the industry. Iâ€™ve led the development of sleek, high-performing web apps that scale, working remotely with global teams to deliver exceptional user experiences. Passionate about turning ideas into polished, responsive interfaces that drive growth.

experience.title: Senior Front End Engineer
experience.summary: I have worked on several projects in various roles, including frontend, backend, DevOps, or a combination of these. I have also contributed to improving development processes and technology across the company.
highlights: Led development of a high-performance web application, achieving 97% PageSpeed score through NextJS optimization, SEO improvements, and AWS infrastructure setup (Route53, CloudFront, EC2, ELB, RDS)
Architected and deployed a microservices backend using NestJS and MongoDB, implementing API documentation with Swagger and CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions
Built a DEX platform with React and Web3.js, integrating smart contracts for token swaps and liquidity provision with 99.9% uptime
Developed a DAO platform using React and FastAPI, implementing proposal management and voting mechanisms with Web3.js integration
Created a real-time trading dashboard with WebSocket integration, achieving sub-second data updates and handling 100K+ concurrent users
Mentored junior developers, conducted code reviews, and established development standards that reduced bug reports by 40%
Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies, reducing API response times by 60%
Designed and implemented secure authentication system using JWT and OAuth2, ensuring GDPR compliance
Set up comprehensive monitoring using ELK stack and Grafana, reducing incident response time by 50%

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.summary: Built and maintained an AI-driven platform that supports business decision-making. Worked mainly on the frontend side with Angular, NgRx and rxjs. Built a microservice using NestJS on the backend side with RabbitMQ for messaging. Mentored junior guys to let them grow in a collaborative team environment.
highlights: Developed a real-time AI-powered task prioritization system using Angular and RxJS, improving team productivity by 30%
Implemented WebSocket integration for live updates and notifications, handling 50K concurrent users
Built reusable UI components library with NgRx state management, reducing development time by 40%
Set up automated testing pipeline with Jest and Cypress, achieving 85% test coverage

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.summary: Built and maintained a health insurance platform from the ground up. Used Laravel, Blade, jQuery, Bootstrap, MongoDB, RESTful API, Nginx, AWS.

education.description: Major concentration in Software Development, Algorithm Design, and Database Management Systems with distinction.
